00090 class EGS_POINT_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_PointSource : public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00091 
00092     EGS_Vector xo;      
00093     bool       valid;   
00094 
00095 public:
00096 
00102     EGS_PointSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec, const EGS_Vector &Xo,
00103             const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00104             EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), xo(Xo), valid(true) {
00105             setUp(); };
00106 
00111     EGS_PointSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00112     ~EGS_PointSource() {};
00113 
00114     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00115             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00116         x = xo;
00117         u.z = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1; EGS_Float sinz = 1-u.z*u.z;
00118         if( sinz > 1e-15 ) {
00119             sinz = sqrt(sinz); EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00120             rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00121             u.x = sinz*cphi; u.y = sinz*sphi;
00122         } else { u.x = 0; u.y = 0; }
00123         wt = 1;
00124     };
00125 
00126     EGS_Float getFluence() const { return count; };
00127 
00128     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &) const { return true; };
00129 
00130     bool setFluenceState(istream &) { return true; };
00131 
00132     bool isValid() const { return (valid && s != 0); };
00133 
00134 protected:
00135 
00137     void setUp();
00138 
00139 };
